title: Chat Application
description: This project aims to learn modern web development by building a real-time chat application.

title: Text Editor
description: This project involves building a text editor with dark and light modes using modern web techniques.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: This is a project made to recommend movies by analyzing correlation, ratings, and watch time.

title: Face Recognition System
description: This project develops a face recognition system using NumPy, KNN, OpenCV, and classifiers to recognize faces, extract faces from videos, and predict faces from memory.

title: Music Player
description: This project develops a comprehensive music player app with playback, playlist, and visualization features.
